title: Honey I'm Home
description: For Dear Sunday’s “Honey I’m Home” Tour, I created a playful series of posters inspired by the original Winnie-the-Pooh characters, now in the public domain. With a nod to Pooh Bear’s love of honey, the designs feature band members in classic, costume-inspired illustrations that tie into the tour's theme. Using a warm, retro color palette and whimsical scenes, the posters capture a nostalgic but modern vibe that aligns with the band’s personality. The result is a memorable, engaging set of visuals that work across digital and print formats.

assets.description: Poster for Dear Sunday's 'Honey I'm Home' Tour, featuring full tour dates and a colourful illustration of band members dressed as classic Winnie-the-Pooh characters. The playful design combines nostalgic cartoon elements with a warm sunset background, bringing a retro, whimsical feel to the tour promotion.
assets.altText: Dear Sunday tour poster showing full tour dates with a cartoon-style illustration of band members in Winnie-the-Pooh costumes against a sunset backdrop.

assets.description: Poster for Dear Sunday's 'Honey I'm Home' East Coast Tour dates, featuring the band in a hot air balloon with bright, retro colours and cartoon elements. The design spotlights the remaining tour stops, maintaining the playful, nostalgic theme of the full tour poster while focusing on the East Coast shows.
assets.altText: Dear Sunday East Coast tour poster with band members in a hot air balloon, featuring colourful cartoon elements and East Coast tour dates.

assets.description: Banner design for Dear Sunday's 'Honey I'm Home' Tour, showcasing band members dressed as Winnie-the-Pooh characters against a cheerful, cartoon-style landscape. The banner highlights the tour’s lighthearted, nostalgic vibe and draws attention with its bright colours and whimsical artwork.
assets.altText: Dear Sunday tour banner with band members in Winnie-the-Pooh costumes, set in a cartoon landscape with bright colours and a cheerful vibe.

title: Absolutely Livid Fest
description: For Absolutely Livid Fest at Livid Skate Café, I designed a poster that captures the raw, high-energy vibe of the event. The artwork features a bold, tentacled skull character, giving it an edgy, psychedelic feel that fits perfectly with the skate and music scene. Using vibrant colours and a gritty, hand-drawn style, the design draws you into the chaotic energy of the festival. The layout keeps all the event details clear while bringing out that rebellious, underground spirit. This poster sets the tone for a day of music, art, and good vibes.

assets.description: Logo for Absolutely Livid Fest, featuring bold, distorted text with a textured, hand-drawn feel that reflects the event's edgy and rebellious vibe.
assets.altText: Absolutely Livid Fest logo with bold, distorted red text and a textured design.

assets.description: Main poster for Absolutely Livid Fest, showcasing a psychedelic skull with tentacles, event details, and band lineup. The bold colours and gritty textures capture the festival’s raw, underground energy.
assets.altText: Absolutely Livid Fest poster featuring a skull with tentacles, event details, and a bold, gritty design.

assets.description: Banner for Absolutely Livid Fest, extending the main poster’s psychedelic theme with a wide layout, featuring the iconic skull and tentacles against a vibrant background.
assets.altText: Absolutely Livid Fest banner with a skull and tentacles, extending the festival's psychedelic theme in a wide layout.

title: Another Rat Records Vinyl Comp 2
description: For the launch of Another Rat Records’ Compilation Vinyl 2, I created a series of posters with a grungy, DIY aesthetic. The design features bold, distressed typography and high-contrast rat imagery, embodying the underground, punk-inspired vibe of the event. The monochromatic colour scheme and gritty textures give it a raw, hand-printed feel, aligning with the record label’s edgy personality. This artwork was used to promote the vinyl launch at Indi Bar on January 14th, with a lineup of local bands to celebrate the release.

assets.description: Main promotional poster for Another Rat Records' Compilation Vinyl 2 launch, featuring gritty, high-contrast rat imagery and a bold, punk-inspired layout.
assets.altText: Another Rat Records poster for Comp Vinyl 2 launch, featuring bold text, rat images, and a grungy, monochromatic style.

assets.description: Banner design for the Another Rat Records Compilation Vinyl 2 launch, showcasing the same DIY, punk-inspired style with distressed typography and rat-themed graphics.
assets.altText: Banner for Another Rat Records vinyl launch with distressed typography and gritty rat illustrations.

title: Late 90s 'Bury Me' National Tour
description: For the 'Bury Me' national tour by Late 90s, I created a series of gritty, punk-inspired posters and banners. The design uses distressed textures, bold typography, and a limited colour palette to reflect the raw energy of the band's music and style. Each piece captures the intensity of live performance through high-contrast images of the band in action, adding an underground feel. The project was designed to stand out across both digital and physical formats, promoting shows around Australia.

assets.description: Primary tour poster for Late 90s' 'Bury Me' tour, featuring bold typography and high-contrast images in blue, yellow, and red for a gritty, punk aesthetic.
assets.altText: Main tour poster for Late 90s 'Bury Me' national tour with high-contrast band images and tour dates in bold text.

assets.description: East Coast-specific poster for Late 90s' 'Bury Me' tour, focusing on shows in Brisbane, Sydney, and Melbourne. The design continues the gritty, high-energy theme.
assets.altText: East Coast tour poster for Late 90s 'Bury Me' tour with band images and East Coast tour dates.

assets.description: Poster for Western Australia shows on the Late 90s' 'Bury Me' tour, highlighting local performances and maintaining the bold, distressed aesthetic.
assets.altText: WA shows poster for Late 90s 'Bury Me' tour with gritty, high-contrast band image and WA tour dates.

assets.description: Banner design for Late 90s' 'Bury Me' tour, using a similar high-contrast style with band images and tour information for a cohesive look.
assets.altText: Banner for Late 90s 'Bury Me' tour with gritty, punk-style imagery and tour information.

title: DICE 'Super-Vision' Single Cover
description: For the single 'Super-Vision' by DICE, I was provided with a photo that I edited to create a double-exposure effect. The black and white portrait, with its blurred and layered look, adds a moody, introspective vibe to the cover, aligning with the tone of the song. The ethereal quality of the edited image enhances the single’s mysterious and reflective atmosphere.

assets.description: Cover art for DICE's single 'Super-Vision', featuring an edited black and white portrait with a double-exposure effect for a mysterious, introspective vibe.
assets.altText: Cover art for DICE's single 'Super-Vision' with an edited black and white portrait creating a double-exposure effect.

title: The Frauds 'Starlight' Cover Art
description: For The Frauds' track 'Starlight', I created cover art inspired by night sky visuals. The artwork features a time-lapse effect with star trails, capturing the expansive, dreamy feel of stargazing. A prominent moon and minimalist landscape enhance the surreal atmosphere, making the design both intriguing and reflective of the song's tone.

assets.description: Cover art for The Frauds' single 'Starlight', featuring star trails, a prominent moon, and a surreal landscape for a dreamy, expansive vibe.
assets.altText: Cover art for The Frauds' single 'Starlight' with star trails, a large moon, and a surreal night landscape.

title: The Frauds 'Haze' Cover Art
description: The cover art for The Frauds' single 'Haze' presents a surreal desert landscape with vibrant colours. A mix of oversized objects like a guitar, a hot air balloon, and a lifeguard tower adds a playful, dreamlike quality to the scene. The artwork's bold, imaginative style reflects the song's psychedelic influences.

assets.description: Cover art for The Frauds' single 'Haze', featuring a surreal desert landscape with oversized objects and vibrant colours for a psychedelic feel.
assets.altText: Cover art for The Frauds' single 'Haze' with a desert landscape, oversized objects, and a vibrant, dreamlike style.
